conditions.short_description: Some new snow in highest mountains, but it has rained in the lowlands. Ongoing snowfall on the night before Thursday and decreasing shower of snow in Friday. Less snow in the south than in the north.
conditions.full_description: Some new snow in highest mountains, but it has rained in the lowlands. Ongoing snowfall on the night before Thursday and decreasing shower of snow in Friday. Less snow in the south than in the north. Thin windslabs can be expected on old firn. Wind slab likely in all aspects due to variable wind directions in the last few days.

area_forecast.forecast: Some new snow added in mountains on Thursday, older snow considered stable.
area_forecast.snow_condition: Some new snow added in mountains on Thursday. On Wednesday the snow melted and subsided, and the older snow is considered stable.
area_forecast.weather: Hægvirði og að mestu þurrt næstu daga

area_forecast.forecast: Snow accumulation varies across the forecast area. However, unstable wind slabs can be expected on south to west-facing slopes where snow has accumulated. Older snow is considered stable.
area_forecast.recent_avalances: Two sluffs fell above Flateyri in Innra-Bæjargil on March 27 but did not extend beyond the gully. A wet snow avalanche reached the base of the slope in Naustahvilft on March 19.
area_forecast.snow_condition: Snow accumulation varies across the forecast area. Following northeasterly winds and snowfall, unstable wind slabs can be expected on south to west-facing slopes where snow has accumulated. The older snowpack is considered stable.
area_forecast.weather: Norðaustan 5-10 og dálítil él næstu daga.

area_forecast.forecast: New snow in the area and slabs in S aspects could be present at high elevations. Older snow has settled and become mostly stable, but older slabs might persist in higher elevations.
area_forecast.snow_condition: The old snow is considered mostly stable. Some old wind slabs could be present in gullies and depressions at higher elevations. New snow added in the last few days and wind slabs possible in N to E aspects after stiff SW wind on Monday and in S to W aspects due to snow and NE wind on Thursday and Friday. Some snowfall in variable wind during the weekend.
area_forecast.weather: Minnkandi él og norðan átt á föstudag. Breytileg átt um helgina og snjókoma með köflum.

area_forecast.forecast: Little or no snow at low elevations and hard packed snow in the mountains with a thin cover of new snow. Softer snow is present in ravines and depressions. New wind slabs possible. Snowfall forecasted this weekend.
area_forecast.snow_condition: Little or no snow is at low elevations and hard packed snow is in the mountains with a thin cover of new snow. The new snow could drift to southerly aspects in northerly wind. Snowfall forecasted this weekend.
area_forecast.weather: Stöku él á föstudag og minnkandi norðan átt, austlægar og suðlægar áttir um helgina og snjókoma með köflum.

weather_forecast.forecast: NE10-20 m/s and snow in the north, strongest wind in the northwest. Southwest 10-15 and rain showers in the south, but 13-18 m/s at the southeast coast. E/NE 5-13 m/s tomorrow, but 10-18 in Vestfirdir. Light snow or snow showers in N Iceland and temperature near or below freezing. A few showers of rain or sleet in the south part and temperature 0 to 7 deg. C.
